mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(D.DUALDATE, 'DD') AS JOINDATE, NVL(SUM(M.CNT), 0) CNT FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(JOINDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS JOINDATE, COUNT(*) CNT FROM MEMBER WHERE JOINDATE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') AND LAST_DAY(SYSDATE) GROUP BY JOINDATE, TO_CHAR(JOINDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ) M , ( SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') + LEVEL - 1 AS DUALDATE FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)- TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') + 1) ) D WHERE D.DUALDATE = M.JOINDATE(+) GROUP BY D.DUALDATE, TO_CHAR(D.DUALDATE, 'DD') ORDER BY D.DUALDATE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE GENDER = 'M' AND TYPE = 'MEMBER' AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE GENDER = 'F' AND TYPE = 'MEMBER' AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT B.TYPE, NVL(ROUND(RATIO_TO_REPORT(SUM(P.QUANTITY)) OVER(),2) * 100,0) RATIO FROM BOOK B, PAYDETAIL P WHERE B.BOOKNO = P.BOOKNO(+) GROUP BY B.TYPE

SELECT BIRTH, COUNT(*) CNT FROM (SELECT CASE WHEN age < 20 THEN '10대' WHEN age >= 20 AND age < 30 THEN '20대' WHEN age >= 30 AND age < 40 THEN '30대' WHEN age >= 40 AND age < 50 THEN '40대' WHEN age >= 50 AND age < 60 THEN '50대' WHEN age >= 60 THEN '60대 이상' END BIRTH FROM (SELECT TRUNC(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, TO_DATE(BIRTH, 'YYYYMMDD'))/12) AGE FROM MEMBER ) ) GROUP BY BIRTH ORDER BY BIRTH
